name: mailcow
description: Mailcow is a complete mail server suite packaged with Docker. It includes Postfix, Dovecot, SOGo, and SpamAssassin, offering full email services with a modern admin UI for domain and mailbox management.

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Includes Postfix, Dovecot, SOGo webmail, and spam filtering in one Docker stack

features.title: User Management
features.description: Host multiple email domains with independent settings and user management

features.title: Webmail Interface
features.description: Access email through SOGo's modern webmail client with calendar and contacts

features.title: Dkim And Spf
features.description: Automatic configuration of email authentication to improve deliverability

features.title: Quarantine Management
features.description: Review and release quarantined messages through the admin interface

features.title: Two-Factor Authentication
features.description: Secure user accounts with TOTP-based 2FA for enhanced security

features.title: REST API
features.description: Automate mailbox and domain management through a comprehensive REST API
